Articles.Content: Im looking to make a thicc spaceplane and Mk4 system looks like a really cool mod that i can use to do so but i was looking through the github and one of its dependencies (B9 Part Switch) says it only works on game version 1.10.1 . Can anyone help?
B9PartSwitch seems to be OK in my 1.12.1. Be bold with this - only mods that have their custom GUIs got broken on that update - and not all of them.
